Sascha Pohflepp (1978– 2019) was a German artist, designer, and writer. He was born in Cologne. His works focused on the role of technology to influence the environment, often in working with artists and scientists. His best known works were "Growth Assembly" (2009, with Alexandra Daisy Ginsberg, illustrations by Sion Ap Tomos); "Spacewalk" (2017); "Deep Unlearning (I)" (2018, with Chris Woebken); and "[https://garagemca.org/en/event/sascha-pohflepp-post-rational-nature Those Who]" (2019).
His death was announced on 25 June 2019. He was 41 years old.
